signInScreen.title: You First

Reveal each others’ answers to
 daily personalized questions

phoneNumberScreen.title: Welcome! Sign In to get started

verificationCodeScreen.title: Your login code was sent to your number.

nameScreen.title: Okay, time to invite your partner! What’s your partner’s name?

relationshipTypeScreen.title: What's your relationship status with your partner?

types.stillGettingToKnowEachOther: Still Getting to Know Each Other

relationshipDateScreen.title: When did you start getting to know each other?

invitePartnerScreen.title: This app only works with your partner. Send your partner the invite!
invitePartnerScreen.inputDescription: By submitting, I have confirmed that I have obtained my partner's consent to send them an SMS invitation

userNameScreen.title: Choose your favorite color and name so your partner can recognize you.

birthdayScreen.inputDescription: Knowing your age helps customize your experience
